intro: Sloanea megaphylla, commonly known as the large-leaf sloanea, is a species of flowering plant in the family Euphorbiaceae. It is native to the tropical regions of South America, particularly Brazil and Peru. The plant is characterized by its large, glossy, elliptical leaves that can reach up to 30 centimeters in length. Sloanea megaphylla produces small, greenish-yellow flowers that are clustered in inflorescences. It is often cultivated as an ornamental plant due to its striking foliage and adaptability to various growing conditions.
